rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome guests. It aligns with Vastu principles by ensuring a clean and unobstructed entry. Natural light is maximized.
The living room offers a modern aesthetic combined with farmhouse elements, featuring large windows for optimal natural lighting and ventilation in accordance with Vastu.
A well-designed kitchen integrated with the dining area, ensuring smooth workflow and energy flow as per Vastu guidelines. It is located in the southeast corner to promote prosperity.
The dining area complements the kitchen and provides ample space for family gatherings, with design elements promoting balance and harmony.
A functional bathroom positioned near the living area yet ensuring privacy, following Vastu norms to avoid water contamination in key areas.

openings.description: Large windows to ensure natural lighting and enhance airflow.

rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed with modern farmhouse aesthetics. Vastu principles are integrated to promote restful sleep, placing the bed in a commanding position.
An exclusive home theater area designed for optimal acoustics and viewing experience. Vastu guidelines are adhered to by situating it away from direct sunlight to enhance energy efficiency.
A small balcony attached to the bedroom for relaxation and a connection with nature. Vastu suggests placing balconies in the northeast to invite positive energy.

openings.description: A modern staircase connecting both floors with safety features and aesthetic appeal.
Windows for additional natural light and ventilation in the bedroom and home theater areas.
